resources.string:
Hi. I am Ainur.

I’m a Machine Learning Engineer currently trying to predict whether a mushroom is edible or poisonous.

 I used to write academic papers about deep learning and how it compares to machine learning when I was a grad student. 

In my spare time, I’m training machine to detect faces using Computer Vision. I have to wear makeup on those days so it won’t judge me. 

When I’m bored, I’ll talk to the chatbot I’m developing using LSTM. 

I also do sentiment analysis on reviews, because let’s face it, I’m as clueless as my chatbot when detecting emotions. 

If my training model is well-behaved, I might believe them when they recommend me a restaurant

.
